paragraphs.title: Populate Items Reference Data for Enrichment
paragraphs.text:
val itemsDF = sqlContext.sql("SELECT id, title, description, tags, img FROM items_temp")
itemsDF.show(30)

paragraphs.title: Most Influential Users By Like Graph
Run PageRank On The Like Graph And Enrich With Reference Data
paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.graphx._
import org.apache.spark.graphx.util._

val edgeTuples = itemRatingsDF.map(rating => (rating(0).toString.toLong, rating(1).toString.toLong))

val convergenceThreshold = 0.01

val graph = Graph.fromEdgeTuples(edgeTuples, "", Some(PartitionStrategy.RandomVertexCut))
val pageRank = graph.pageRank(convergenceThreshold).cache()

val topInfluencers = pageRank.vertices.top(10)(Ordering.by(rank => rank._2))
val topInfluencersDF = sc.parallelize(topInfluencers).toDF("userId", "rank")

result.msg:
import org.apache.spark.graphx._
import org.apache.spark.graphx.util._
<console>:34: error: not found: value itemRatingsDF

paragraphs.title: Save Top Influencers to ElasticSearch
paragraphs.text:
import org.elasticsearch.spark.sql._
import org.apache.spark.sql.SaveMode

val esConfig = Map("pushdown" -> "true", "es.nodes" -> "127.0.0.1", "es.port" -> "9200")
enrichedTopInfluencersDF.write.format("org.elasticsearch.spark.sql").mode(SaveMode.Overwrite).options(esConfig).save("advancedspark/top-influencers")

result.msg:
<console>:27: error: object elasticsearch is not a member of package org
       import org.elasticsearch.spark.sql._
                  ^
